quotes.text: The onus is on you to demonstrate greatness, and then you’ll get the opportunities. It’s not the other way around.
quotes.author: Richard Hamming

quotes.text: The way you lead your life from day to day you prepare yourself for success or you don’t. And when the lightning strikes, you’re either ready or you’re not. It misses you, or hits you.
quotes.author: Richard Hamming
